sentences.sContent: He was the most obstinate man I’ve ever met.
sentences.sCn: 他是我遇到过的最固执的人。

synos.tran: 顽固的；倔强的；难以控制的

words.tran: 固执，顽固；（病痛等的）难治，难解除

trans.tranCn: 顽固的；倔强的；难以控制的
trans.tranOther: determined not to change your ideas, behaviour, opinions etc, even when other people think you are being unreasonable
